title: Double Chocolate Oat Cookies
ingredients: ['375g oatmeal', '250g butter, softened', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '220g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '375g chocolate chips', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 block (250g) milk chocolate, grated', '185g chopped nuts']
